featured.text: Waimea Canyon, called the "Grand Canyon of the Pacific" by Mark Twain, cuts a deep gash through the rugged central mountains.

definition.zh_def: 在表面上切或劃出一條長而淺的傷口或裂縫。
definition.en_def: To make a long, deep cut or wound in a surface.
definition.example: He accidentally made a gash in the wall while moving the furniture.
